name: Zeus Vs Moles (HTML)
description:
How to play :

  • Go in full screen
  • Point and click to move, touch the moles to hurt them
  • Moles become darker when they are hurt (do not be hard with their dead body)
  • That's all

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 38, a game made by myself in 48h.

--> Ludum Dare submission post

I had the idea to create a world with a god : Zeus. He's on his own planet, however he have an issue : there is an invasion of moles. So, he have to hunt them.

Tools :

  • Unity3D to program (C#)
  • GarageBand to make the music and Bfxr to make the sounds
  • Magicavoxel to create the characters and the environment
  • Gimp2 to make 2D elements

Fouralex
